Your Diaeta Consultation in Woluwe-Saint-Pierre

Address

Access & Information

Location

See on Google Maps

Services Offered at this Location

  • Personalized programs for sustainable weight loss
  • Nutritional management of type 2 diabetes
  • Cholesterol and hypertension management
  • Support for Irritable Bowel Syndrome (Low FODMAP approach)
  • Nutrigenomics consultations (on request)
  • And other personalized dietary follow-ups...

All consultations at Les Etrimaux are provided by Pierre Abou-Zeid, a certified Dietitian-Nutritionist (INAMI) and MONASH certified.

Discover Pierre's expertise

Diaeta welcomes you to Les Etrimaux (Woluwe-Saint-Pierre) to support you in achieving your health and wellness goals.
